timeline.bodyText: Should the date time channel be set to undef if it isn't present?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText:
It could, but I don't think it is necessary. You cannot enter incorrect date or time in the panel I believe and therefore it cannot change from correct to incorrect. This is the only case when it should be reset to undef.
For the sake of completeness I can add it if you think it does make sense.
replies.author: druciak
